title.rendered: Integrating Magento With NetSuite ERP System

content.rendered:
Do you want to skyrocket your business growth? And want to experience the real digital retail experience? Then you must not wait and hire Magento developer to partner with the global eCommerce ecosystem. Magento is a great eCommerce solution for every commerce type and size of business.

To make your business stand out from the rest, Magento offers the greatest tools. Hiring a dedicated Magento developer will ensure the support and inspiration you need for your commerce. Many small, mid and large-size businesses and enterprises are benefiting from the power & flexibility of Magento.

Each year, a large percentage of U.S retail sale is drawn from eCommerce. Statistics depict that the total value of global retail eCommerce sales will reach $3.45 trillion by the end of the year. Moreover, by 2040 around 95% of all purchases are expected to be via eCommerce.

Becoming up-to-date with the latest eCommerce trends could be critical. Similarly, it is important for the eCommerce platform providers, WordPress, Magento to release updates regularly for seamless functioning.

The data of the online shopper’s behavior and growth projections will help strengthen the eCommerce strategy. Thus, to have an updated and modernized business, one must-have NetSuite integration.

Past in 2013, NetSuite announced an Order Management system for Magento retailers. This system allows to easily meet customer demand for unified omnichannel commerce experience. Magento oracle NetSuite integration is a cloud-based, comprehensive solution that boosts the functionality of commerce. With the help of NetSuite eCommerce, the retailer will not have to rely on custom-built applications.

Today’s Magento marketplace has modernized. For a seamless Magento Commerce and business growth, best practices have been taken. Magento eCommerce with NetSuite integration are some of the best practices to:

  • Increase efficiency
  • Inventory Management
  • Orders Management
  • Manage customer data
  • Handle shipping details

However, an online store can easily be operated without ERP solutions, but it may put the customer’s experience at stake.

Why Connecting Magento eCommerce With ERP Is Good For Your Business?

Riese and Muller are leading electrical power and folding bikes. Their premium bicycle segment consists of groundbreaking designs with standard quality and technical innovation. The company is almost 25 years old and holds about 350 employees segregated in different profiles.

This award-winning company wanted to change the analog process of the pre-ordering bike. The objective behind it was:

  • Greater transparency
  • Simplicity
  • User-friendliness
  • Automation of the order

This greater objective was resolved by integrating ERP solutions in Magento 2 eCommerce platform. Magento 2 ERP integration not only reduced unwanted errors but, also relived their sales team of customer service calls.

Thus, this case study indicates the goodness of NetSuite ERP integration in your Magento platform. We can also say that ERP solutions

  • A more accurate picture of the product – ERP contains highly critical data like orders, customer info, product data, shipping methods and more. Thus, integrating eCommerce with ERP allows both platforms to run parallelly.
  • Where is my order – Customers become impatient when they keenly await their order. And when they are unaware of their order, they would make a continuous track by calling the merchant. Thus, integrating both may help reduce these calls. This will also give real-time access to shipping.
  • Instant visibility of the transactions – Integrating Magento 2 eCommerce means storing less inventory. This integration will also save you from the risk of an order-inventory mismatch. No more lagging information of the purchase information with ERP systems. Product levels will be managed in real-time.
  • Apply rates & customer-specific rules – With the help of eCommerce business trends, Magento 2 extensions in ERP will allow store tax information in a specific place. No more manually synchronizing data with the local and regional regulations. This will also ensure that the customers receive their negotiated contract pricing and the right set of products.

But how would you integrate the two? By hiring Magento 2 developer, a certified solution partner who has deep expertise in ERP system integration. Thus, you must take advantage of the integration like thousands of B2B and B2C merchants.

Why is Magento 2 Oracle NetSuite Integration Important?

NetSuite eCommerce Magento 2 integration will allow minimum risks and avoid common mistakes. Magento is highly flexible to get integrated with a variety of ERP systems like – Microsoft Dynamics, NetSuite, SAP, Oracle, Infor, Epicor, Sage and more.

Your eCommerce solution partners in the Magento marketplace can define and refine your requirements. Choosing the right Magento Solution partner for Magento eCommerce development aids in establishing an integration timeline and decide between a variety of pre-built connectors. This will also assist you in reduced cost and complexity.

NetSuite ERP runs all the key financial processes on cloud-like accounting, inventory, supply chain and order management. With eCommerce in unifies every step from sales to support.

Before relying on any solution partner you must:

  • Have a rough idea of the business
  • Both systems start fetching document workflow
  • Allocate a system to record platform for varied data
  • Lastly, your budget estimation

The questions you can prepare before hiring them for the integration:

  • Past experience of work
  • Track record of building eCommerce sores or Netsuite ERP Magento 2 integration
  • Number of successful NetSuite eCommerce integration
  • Description of customer/firm/industry
  • Recommendations
  • Cost and integration developmental process
  • Minimizing development timelines with iPass (integrated Platform as a service) and iPass enabled apps

    • In the Nutshell

    Ready to get your eCommerce Magento 2 NetSuite ERP integration for more flexibility and scalability. The idea of installing the NetSuite ERP system is to keep expanding without ever having to install a new back office.

    ERP platform users will need a more robust and advanced eCommerce platform. And Magento eCommerce platform is undoubtedly the most advanced with the features like – Rapid Content Publishing, and out of the box support system for B2B use cases.

    It is recorded that the fastest growth in retail eCommerce between 2018-2022 is expected in India and Indonesia.

    In order to customize your eCommerce experience, you can find thousands of Magento 2 extension. Hiring a dedicated Magento developer will ease and efficiently integrate both the systems for minimum risk, launching faster and save money.
